loginDescription: Enter your email to sign in to your account
invalidEmailOrPassword: Email or password is not correct!
doNotHaveAnAccount: Don't have an account? Sign Up
requestPasswordResetDescription: Click the following button to receive an email with further instructions for recovering your account.
resetPasswordDescription: Enter a new password and click the following button to successfully reset your password.
resetPasswordLinkSended: A confirmation link has been sent to your email. Please check your inbox to complete the password reset.
passwordWasUpdated: Your password has been successfully reset. You can now log in with your new password.
passwordResetTokenExpired: The request is invalid or expired. Please request a new token and try again.
createAnAccountDescription: Enter email and password to create your account.
acceptAgbs: By registering, you agree to the Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy, as well as the Use of Cookies.
completedRegistrationDescritpion: Congratulations on successfully creating your account! A verification email containing a verification link has been sent to your inbox. Once you've verified your email, you'll be able to log in.
emailWasVerified: Your email has been successfully verified. You can now log in with your email and password.
emailVerifictionTokenExpired: The request is invalid or expired. Please click to following button to initiate the process of email verification once again.
resendedVerificationEmail: The verification email has been resent to you. Please check your inbox and proceed with email verification.
clickHereToResendVerifcationEmail: Click here to resend verification email.
newTopicDescription: You can also choose a matching icon.
title: Title
deleteTopicDescription: Are you sure you want to delete the topic "{{topicTitle}}"?
noTopicsCreatedDescription: You don't have any topics yet. Create your first topic now.
questionDescription: You can add up to 4 multiple choice answers. One answer can be correct.
question: Question
addNewAnswerDescription: Click the bottom below to add a new answer.
missingCorrectAnswer: At least one answer must be marked as correct.

inviteLinkWasCopied.title: Invite link was copied.
inviteLinkWasCopied.description: Invite link for the topic "{{topicTitle}}" was copied.

acceptTopic.title: New Topic Invite
acceptTopic.description: You have been invited to join the topic "{{topicTitle}}" which was created by "{{creatorName}}"

invalidInviteLink: The given invalid link is not valid!
canNotInviteToOwnTopic: You can not invite yourself to your own topic.
alreadyTopicParticipant: Already accepted invite for this topic.
creator: Creator
startQuizDescription: Invite other participants to the right and wait for their acceptance. Once everyone is prepared, commence the quiz.
exerciseInviteDescription: You are invited to participate in a quiz on the topic "{{topicTitle}}".
waitingForQuizToStart: Waiting for the quiz creator to start to quiz.
onlyQuizCreatorCanInvite: Only the quiz creator can invite participants.

alreadyInQuiz.title: User is already in quiz
alreadyInQuiz.description: User can only be invited if his active quiz is finished.

deleteAccountDescription: Would you like to permanently erase your personal data? This action cannot be undone.
confirmAccountDeletionDescription: You have selected to delete your account. Please type 'delete account' in the text box below to confirm this action.
invalidConfirmationInput: Invalid input. Your must type 'delete account'.
